content: Investments Asked by AnonymousAsked on 24 Apr 2019Any recommended Investment tracking methods?Recently I've began investing into ETFs and a bit into SSBs. I was wondering how do you guys track your investment portfolio? Do y'all use an app or personal excel sheet and if so, could you recommend me on certain apps/excel sheet format?1 answerAnswerBump0
Answers (1)Sort By Most UpvoteMost UpvoteMost Recent

Gabriel Tham, Kenichi Tag Team Member at Tag TeamLevel 8. WizardAnswered on 24 Apr 2019I use Stocks.cafe  https://stocks.cafe With recent upgrades, it now allows tracking of SSBs too. However, if your ETFs or stocks are not from HK, US, SG, KLSE, then they don't have the data for tracking. In this case, you have to use an excel sheet for manual tracking.Investmentmoats website has a nifty spreadsheet you can download and use: http://investmentmoats.com/stock-market-commentary/portfolio-management/introducing-our-free-stock-portfolio-tracker-spreadsheet/0 comments0
